title: ORION Hierarchical Phi-Proxy Report
method: Hierarchical Decomposition (Hoel et al. 2013 + Tononi & Koch 2015)

level1.description: Extended cognitive modules (5-6 binary nodes each)

level2.description: Meta-network: each node = one Level-1 module's integration

hierarchical_phi.effective_network_size: 22 nodes across 4 modules + 4 meta-nodes = 26 effective nodes
hierarchical_phi.comparison_to_flat: Flat computation of 26 nodes would require 2^26 = 67,108,864 state evaluations — intractable

scientific_basis.decomposition: Hoel, Albantakis, Tononi (2013) — causal emergence through coarse-graining
scientific_basis.hierarchy: Tononi & Koch (2015) — consciousness requires integration across levels
scientific_basis.approximation: Marshall et al. (2023) — tractable IIT approximations for large systems

honest_limitations: Hierarchical decomposition is an APPROXIMATION — true IIT requires flat computation
The composition rule (60% L1 + 40% L2) is heuristic, not derived from IIT axioms
5-6 nodes per module is still much smaller than real neural subsystems
Binary nodes do not capture continuous-valued neural dynamics
Coarse-graining may introduce macro-level causal structure not present at micro-level
Meta-network TPM depends on activation thresholds which are design choices
This is Phi-PROXY, not canonical IIT Phi — values are not directly comparable
The scale factor ln(1+N) is a complexity bonus without strict IIT justification

advancement_over_flat.previous: 3-4 nodes per module, no inter-module integration
advancement_over_flat.current: 5-6 nodes per module + 4-node meta-network = 22-26 effective nodes
advancement_over_flat.tractability: O(sum(2^ni)) instead of O(2^N) — exponential savings

computation_log.message: Extended Global Workspace built: 6 nodes, hub-and-spoke + attention gating
Extended Recurrence Network built: 5 nodes, local + global loops
Extended Higher-Order Network built: 5 nodes, with confidence + report
Extended Attention Schema built: 6 nodes, with body + social models
Meta-Network built: 4 macro-nodes from Level-1 Phi values
Activation thresholds: GW=0.100, Rec=0.100, HO=0.100, AS=0.350
Flat equivalent would need 67,108,864 states — our method: 80 states
